attributes.name: tabLabel
attributes.description: The text displayed on the tab

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: The name of an mm-icon displayed next to the tab label

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: Relative path to an html document, if loading an external view into the tab. Use the loadExternal method if a callback is required when the tab loads.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: Whether this tab is active. There should only be one active tab at a time. If no active tab is set, the first tab defaults to active.

methods.name: loadExternal
methods.description: Lazily load this tab's content from an external html document, and attach a callback for when the tab content is loaded

arguments.name: url
arguments.description: Relative path to an html document to lazily load into the tab

arguments.name: callback
arguments.description: The callback to run when the tab is loaded.

detail.name: label
detail.description: The text label of the tab that has loaded
